title: Turkey Red Fred Clarke HOF PSA 3
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: Turkey Red Fred Clarke HOF PSA 3
posts.post_content: Nice Turkey Red of Hall of Famer Fred Clarke. It has solid corners and great clarity and contrast. Small line crease or wrinkle upper right (which is hard to see in the scan) is why it did not grade higher. It was graded before the half grade designation $525.00 includes shipping and insurance
